scripts.docker:build: npm run setup:services && npm run copy:env && tsx ./docker-compose.ts pull
scripts.docker:start: npm run copy:env && tsx ./docker-compose.ts up -d && npm run start:services
scripts.docker:stop: npm run copy:env && tsx ./docker-compose.ts stop && npm run stop:services
scripts.docker:reset: tsx ./docker-compose.ts down --rmi all -v --remove-orphans && npm run stop:services && rimraf ./.env
